title: Notes From Nashville: How Emerging Tech Centers Are Attracting Talent With Perks, Cash, Tax Incentives And More - Crunchbase News
content: Notes From Nashville: How Emerging Tech Centers Are Attracting Talent With Perks, Cash, Tax Incentives And More  Crunchbase News
description: With everyone competing for a finite number of tech workers, the new kids on the block—emerging tech centers—are having to get creative in their recruitment efforts, writes Brian Moyer, CEO of the Greater Nashville Technology Council.
